You made it!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "So... what do you think?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "I've been thinking... You know how I used to dream of being an athlete someday?#$b#Well, my life ended up turning out a bit different... $9#$b#I'm happy, though, don't get me wrong!$h#$b#...But I thought it would be cool to have a place where us guys could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room!#$b#This way, I get to keep part of 'the dream' alive, in a small way."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Thanks, Grandpa."/pause 500/speak Kent "I'm happy for an excuse to get out of the house, and take my mind off things."/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "Same"/pause 1200/
          speak Gus "I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!$h#$b#Though Shane should maybe put down the pepper poppers for now...$h"/ -- changed from comment on shanes liver/
